DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety immunogenicity three different concentration TBE vaccine healthy child age 1 6 year .
DOC.brief_title: Dose-finding Study Investigate Safety Immunogenicity Two Vaccinations With FSME IMMUN NEW Healthy Volunteers Aged 1 6 Years .
DOC.criteria: Male female child eligible participation study : 1 year ( 1st birthday ) 6 year ( last day 6th birthday ) old ; clinically healthy ; legal representative understands nature study , agree provision give write informed consent ; legal representative agree keep Volunteer Diary . Children exclude participation study : history previous TBE vaccination ; history TBE infection show evidence latent TBE infection ( demonstrated screening ELISA > 126 VIEU/ml / neutralization test > 1:10 ) ; history allergic reaction , particular one component vaccine ; receive antipyretic within 4 hour prior first TBE vaccination ; suffer disease effectively treat stabilize ; suffer disease ( e.g . autoimmune disease ) undergo form treatment expect influence immunological function ; suffer chronic , degenerative / inflammatory disease central nervous system ; know HIV positive ( special HIV test require purpose study ) ; suffer febrile illness study entry ; history vaccination yellow fever / Japanese Bencephalitis ; participate simultaneously another clinical trial .
